title: MyCompany
name: Name
errorEmailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use.
errorIncorrectLoginInformation: The ID is not registered, or the password is incorrect.
errorTooManyRequests: Too many requests. Try again later.
passwordRegularExpressionValidationError: Password must be 8-20 characters that include at least 1 alphabet and 1 number
duplicateLoginWarning: 다른기기에서 로그인 중 입니다. 강제 로그아웃하고, 현재 기기에서 로그인 하시겠습니까?
userTypeSelectViewMainMessage:
Select Create Company
or Join Company.
userTypeSelectViewHintMessage:
You can create a new company or
join companies that have already been created.
joinCompanyViewHintMessage: Select a company and click the 'Join' button.
createCompanyViewHintMessage: Enter a new company name and click the 'Create Company' button.
createCompanySuccessViewHintMessage: Now you can use the MY COMPANY service in the newly created company.
waitJoinCompanyApprovalViewHintMessage: When the manager's approval is completed, you can use the MY COMPANY service.
rejectJoinCompanyApprovalViewHintMessage: Please contact the person in charge of the company and join the company again.
joinCompanySuccessViewHintMessage: Now you can use the MY COMPANY service in the company you joined.
